info.name: Restful Booker API
info.description:
This project demonstrates API testing of the [Restful Booker](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html) service using **Postman** and **Newman**. It replicates real-world QA workflows, covering core API functionalities through both positive and negative test scenarios.

For more Infomation [Click](https://github.com/pakjira-p/restful-booker-apitest?tab=readme-ov-file)

## üß™ Test Scope Based on API Documentation

Based on the official [Restful Booker API Docs](https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/apidoc/index.html), the following endpoints were tested:

### ‚úîÔ∏è Covered Endpoints:

- `GET /ping` ‚Äì Health check
    
- `POST /auth` ‚Äì Create token
    
- `POST /booking` ‚Äì Create booking
    
- `GET /booking` ‚Äì Retrieve all booking IDs
    
- `GET /booking/:id` ‚Äì Get booking by ID
    
- `PUT /booking/:id` ‚Äì Full update
    
- `PATCH /booking/:id` ‚Äì Partial update
    
- `DELETE /booking/:id` ‚Äì Delete booking
    

### ‚ùå Out of Scope:

- Rate limiting
    
- Security testing (e.g., SQL Injection, XSS)
    
- UI testing
    

Each endpoint is tested with:

- ‚úÖ Positive cases
    
- ‚ùå Negative cases (e.g., invalid input, missing auth)
    
- üîÑ Edge cases (e.g., blank fields, invalid formats)

exec: // Test case T01: Ping health check
// Test case T02: Incorrect method for Ping health check
// Test case T03: Status Code is 200
// Test case T04: Token is created and valid
pm.test("Token is created and valid", function () {

request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl -X POST \
  https://restful-booker.herokuapp.com/auth \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "username" : "admin",
    "password" : "password123"
}'

exec: // Test case T05: Status Code is 401 Unauthorized for invalid credentials
// Test case T06: Error message for invalid credentials

request.description:

  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -d '{
    "username" : "wrong_user",
    "password" : "wrong_pass"
}'

    "lastname" : "Brown",

    },
    "additionalneeds" : "Breakfast"
}'
